column4: someone just told me that AMD64 chips run 32-bit code already without emulation.
hmm - any idea where I can find more information on using AMD64 for 32-bit apps?
I am very much enjoying the 64-bit support in Ubuntu Feisty, but there are still lots of apps (mostly closed-source) that will not run on my machine
there is some stuff on google, basically u have a 32bit lin vmachine in 64bit linux as far as i know, i just installed 32bit (im noob so why make it too hard)
